justification: Identifies Team B’s desire for stable WRs and injury caution, but mislabels Brandon Martinez as a possession WR and Ethan Turner as low-variance. Proposes B trade a Tier 1 RB (Rodriguez) despite B’s conservative, consensus-trusting style that values workhorse RBs. TE upgrade is marginal given B’s current TE4. The offer is imbalanced and inconsistent with B’s priorities, so acceptance is unlikely despite the multi-player rationale.
